heading: HB03314
0: AN ACT PRESCRIBING URGENT RELATED MEASURES NECESSARY AND PROPER TO EFFECTIVELY ADDRESS THE TRAFFIC CRISIS IN METRO MANILA AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
short-title: Metro Manila Traffic Crisis Act Of 2016
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2018-12-03, transmitted to the Senate on 2018-12-04 and received by the Senate on 2018-12-04 Substituted by HB06425
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03314
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PRESCRIBING URGENT RELATED MEASURES NECESSARY AND PROPER TO EFFECTIVELY ADDRESS THE TRAFFIC CRISIS IN METRO MANILA AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Metro Manila Traffic Crisis Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Seeks to address the traffic crisis in Metro Manila that has disrupted the country’s economic and social life.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : PRIMICIAS-AGABAS, MARLYN L.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Bulut-Begtang (014 2017-08-23)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-10
      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 3, 38, 554, 1315, 1666, 3048, 3162, 3314, 3442, 3617, 3712, 3716, 4334, 4699 and HR No. 119 was approved with amendments.
MOTHER BILL: HB06425
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2016-08-31
